story.text: (Adds Ace USA, Steptoe & Johnson)NEW YORK Jan 2 (Reuters) - The following financial service industry appointments and moves were announced on Tuesday. To inform us of other job changes, please e-mail: moves@reuters.com ACE USA The unit of Ace Ltd. (ACE.N) named Christopher Maleno as president, Ace USA regional operations, and Joseph Clabby as president, Ace USA West. STEPTOE & JOHNSON The law firm said it was opening a Chicago office in January. Nine partners that focus on commercial, insurance, and reinsurance litigation will join from Drinker Biddle Gardner Carton. The Chicago group is led by partners Christopher Barber and Stephen O'Donnell. DEUTSCHE BANK AG (DBKGn.DE) The German bank's Deutsche Bank Securities unit said on Monday that Peter Babej, previously with Lazard Ltd., (LAZ.N) has joined as head of insurance investment banking for the Americas. He will also chair Deutsche Bank's new Global Insurance Committee within financial institutions banking. BANK OF AMERICA CORP. (BAC.N) Chris Innes, global head of equity financial products at Bank of America Corp., and Pat Augustine, global head of structured products, have left Bank of America as part of a reorganization, a spokeswoman said on Tuesday.
